content.prompt: The leaders of the rest of Europe saw the ideas in the preamble as a threat because

choices.label: the ideas threatened to transform the social and political hierarchies of Europe
the ideas used the power of nationalism to mobilize a powerful military
the ideas challenged Enlightenment belief in reason and empiricism
the ideas risked a revival of conflicts between Catholics and Protestants

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
